name: Department of Information Technology
desc: The Department of Information Technology (DIT), nestled within the College of Engineering and Information Technology (CEIT), is housed in a modern building characterized by sleek architecture and cutting-edge facilities. Its spacious atrium welcomes students and visitors, while state-of-the-art classrooms, labs, and collaborative spaces provide an ideal environment for learning and research. From interactive displays showcasing the latest advancements to dedicated research wings driving innovation, the department's building serves as a dynamic hub for aspiring technologists and researchers alike.

facilities.Computer Laboratory: The Computer Laboratory is equipped with the latest hardware and software to support students in their coursework and research. From programming to networking, students have access to the tools they need to succeed.

name: Office of Student Affairs and Services
desc: Welcome to the Office of Student Affairs and Services at Cavite State University — A cornerstone of student support and development. Established in 1980, our office has evolved to meet the diverse needs of our students. From counseling and testing to financial assistance and talent development, we're here to empower students to reach their full potential. Whether it's guidance, training, or placement services, we're committed to fostering an environment where every student can thrive intellectually, emotionally, and socially.

name: International House 2 (Dormitory)
desc: International House 2 is a modern dorm near campus gate 1. It offers comfortable rooms, common areas, and a friendly atmosphere for students to live and socialize.

services.Book Store: The book store is located at the ground floor in the right wing of the building. You can buy the text books and books in here.
services.School Uniform Store: The School Uniform store is located at the ground floor in the right wing of the building. You can buy the student uniform here and try on different sizes for better fit.

name: College of Sports, Physical Education, and Recreation
desc: Introducing the College of Sports, Physical Education, and Recreation at Cavite State University, established in 1998 to promote excellence in sports across the Southern Tagalog Region. Our mission is to provide top-tier instruction in physical education and recreation sciences while fostering a culture of active living among students and the community. With a focus on leadership and collaboration, we're dedicated to shaping competent professionals and elevating the region's sporting landscape.
dept: Physical Education, Exercise and Sports Science

name: Bahay ng Alumni
desc: Welcome to Bahay ng Alumni—a cozy retreat found near the Gymnasium of the University. Our inviting rooms offer a blend of comfort and nostalgia, providing guests with a home-away-from-home experience. Whether you're here for a trip down memory lane or attending an event, we promise a memorable stay filled with warmth and hospitality.

name: National Coffee Research, Development and Extension Center
desc: Welcome to the National Coffee Research, Development, and Extension Center (NCRDEC) at Cavite State University (CvSU)—a pioneering force in Philippine coffee innovation since 2005. Our center, established under the Agriculture and Fisheries Modernization Act (AFMA) of 1997, conducts cutting-edge research, provides vital extension services, and produces top-quality planting materials. With a vision to be recognized locally and internationally for our coffee programs, we're dedicated to increasing productivity, sustainability, and global competitiveness in the Philippine coffee industry.

name: College of Economics, Management and Development Studies New Building
desc: The College of Economics, Management, and Development Studies unveils its new building – a modern hub for academic exploration. This technologically advanced facility fosters collaboration and critical thinking with its spacious learning areas and innovative design. Here, students delve into economics, management, and development studies in a dynamic environment that fuels academic excellence.

BS BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION:
• Financial Management
• Human Resource Development Management
• Marketing Management
• Operations Management
• Service Management Program
BS DEVELOPMENT MANAGEMENT:
• Rural Development Management
• Training Program Management
GRADUATE PROGRAMS:
• Master in Business Administration
• Master in Management
• Master in Public Administration

name: College of Agriculture, Forestry, Environment and Natural Resources
desc: The College of Agriculture, Forestry, Environment, and Natural Resources building embodies innovation and sustainability. Its modern design integrates seamlessly with nature, featuring spacious interiors filled with natural light and cutting-edge facilities. With a focus on eco-friendly practices, including energy-efficient systems and green rooftops, the building serves as a hub for interdisciplinary learning and research. Surrounded by lush gardens and outdoor spaces, it inspires environmental stewardship and fosters collaboration among students and faculty.
dept: Department of Forestry and Environmental Science (DFES)
Institute of Food Science and Technology (IFST)

facilities.Fruit Crops Nursery & Production: This project are focuses on the production, propagation maintenance & marketing of selected fruit crops such as rambutan, mangosteen, cacao, lemon, calamansi, lanzones, etc.
facilities.Ornamental Nursery & Production: This area is allotted for the different ornamental crops available ate the greenhouse, for propagation, and nursery establishment.
facilities.CHARMS Project: This demo area focuses on the various medicinal plants, herbs and spices available for general consumption.
facilities.High-Value Vegetable Production Area: This production area is allotted for the different high-value vegetable crops produced and managed by students conducting. Their research and entrepreneurial development studies.

name: Research Center
desc: Introducing the Research Center Building at Cavite State University: a nexus of innovation and collaboration. Equipped with cutting-edge facilities, it fosters groundbreaking research across disciplines, especially in agriculture. Designed for knowledge dissemination and external engagement, it serves as a hub for forging partnerships, training, and recognizing outstanding achievements. A beacon of progress, it embodies the university's commitment to improving lives and advancing knowledge for the community.

name: Ladislao N. Diwa Memorial Library
desc: Welcome to the Ladislao N. Diwa Memorial Library and Museum (LDMLM)—a symbol of knowledge and heritage since 1980. With a collection of over 106,000 volumes and 5,000 series titles, LDMLM honors Ladislao N. Diwa's contributions to academia. Operating under an open shelf system, our mission is to provide excellent, equitable, and relevant library services. We aim to support academic excellence, encourage maximum utilization of resources, and collaborate with all colleges and campuses to supplement research and instruction. Step inside and discover a world of knowledge and inspiration.

facilities.Fifth Floor: STAARDEC: The office of Southern Tagalog Agriculture, Aquatic and Resources Research, Development and Extension Consortium (STAARRDEC) can be found in 5th floor.

name: Interdisciplinary Research Building
desc: Welcome to the Interdisciplinary Research Building (IDRB) at the University. Here, cutting-edge research thrives in specialized laboratories spanning engineering, microbiology, genetics, and more. Led by expert faculty researchers, these labs are hubs of innovation, fostering collaboration and pushing the boundaries of knowledge. With state-of-the-art facilities and close coordination with the Technical Services Division, the IDRB is where breakthroughs happen. Welcome to a space where interdisciplinary exploration knows no bounds.

name: International House 1 / College of Medicine
desc: International House 1 welcomes students with open arms, serving as a vibrant home away from home for the university community.  This bustling dormitory fosters a diverse and inclusive environment, where students from all walks of life connect and forge lasting friendships.  International House 1 which also houses the College of Medicine, offers comfortable living spaces, modern amenities, and a supportive atmosphere that empowers residents to excel academically, socially, and personally.  Here, students thrive within a community that fosters unforgettable experiences.

name: Department of Biological Sciences
desc: Welcome to the Department of Biological Sciences at the University. Our state-of-the-art facilities and passionate community of scholars are dedicated to exploring the wonders of life. From molecular biology to ecology, we're committed to advancing our understanding of the natural world and addressing global challenges. Join us on a journey of discovery and exploration. Welcome to the heart of scientific inquiry.

name: College of Engineering and Information Technology
desc: The College of Engineering and Information Technology (CEIT) fosters a dynamic scholarly community dedicated to advancing the frontiers of engineering innovation. CEIT faculty address global challenges through research and curriculum focused on areas such as resilient infrastructure and sustainable transportation systems. By joining CEIT, you will contribute to shaping a brighter future.

courses.Bachelor of Science in Industrial Techno:
Courses Majors:
• Automotive Technology
• Electrical Technology
• Electronics Technology

name: Department of Industrial Engineering and Technology
desc: Welcome to the Department of Industrial Engineering and Technology at our University. Within our dedicated community, we explore the forefront of technology and innovation. From optimizing manufacturing processes to enhancing supply chain efficiency, we're committed to solving real-world challenges and driving industry forward. Join us as we embark on a journey of discovery and innovation. Welcome to the heart of industrial engineering excellence.

name: Department of Computer, Electronics, and Electrical Engineering
desc: Welcome to the Department of Computer, Electronics, and Electrical Engineering at our University. Within our dedicated community, we delve into the forefront of technology and innovation. From developing cutting-edge software solutions to designing efficient electronic systems, we're committed to tackling real-world challenges and propelling industries forward. Join us as we embark on a journey of discovery and innovation. Welcome to the heart of engineering excellence.

name: Administration Building
desc: Welcome to the Cavite State University Administration Building at our University.

offices.Public Affairs and Communications Office:
A university resolution restructured the administration, moving the public information office under the president's control and renaming it the Public Affairs and Communications Office (PACO). PACO is responsible for maintaining the university's public profile, keeping activity records, creating promotional materials, compiling annual reports, and connecting with media outlets.

• E-mail: paco@cvsu.edu.ph
• Contact Number: 09163410750

name: Cavite State University Science High School
desc: The CvSU Science High School boasts a rich heritage. The school inhabits the historic Gabaldon buildings, the oldest structures on campus, serving as a testament to CvSU's longstanding commitment to education. Inside these esteemed walls, a lively student community flourishes under the guidance of a dedicated faculty. The faculty fosters a love for science, mathematics, and research, preparing students to be the future leaders in scientific fields. Equipped with cutting-edge facilities and resources, the CvSU Science High School provides an ideal learning environment for students to embark on their scientific pursuits.

name: Cavite State University Science High School 2
desc: The CvSU Science High School boasts a rich heritage. The school inhabits the historic Gabaldon buildings, the oldest structures on campus, serving as a testament to CvSU's longstanding commitment to education. Inside these esteemed walls, a lively student community flourishes under the guidance of a dedicated faculty. The faculty fosters a love for science, mathematics, and research, preparing students to be the future leaders in scientific fields. Equipped with cutting-edge facilities and resources, the CvSU Science High School provides an ideal learning environment for students to embark on their scientific pursuits.

name: Physical Science Building
desc: This is the Physical Science Building at our University.

name: College of Education
desc: The College of Education welcomes you! Committed to the transformative power of education, their diverse community offers the tools and support for success in a dynamic field.  Through innovative research and hands-on experiences, they empower you to make a lasting impact. Here, learning is limitless and excellence is expected.
dept:
• Teacher Education Department (TED)
• Home Economics, Vocational and Technical Education Department (HEVTED)

courses.Bachelor of Elementary Education:
Course Majors:

• Early Childhood Education

• Curriculum and Instruction
• Elementary Education
• Secondary Education
• Mathematics
• Biology
• Chemistry

name: Child Development Center
desc: The Child Development Center fosters a belief in the transformative power of early childhood education. Within our supportive and welcoming environment, dedicated mentors provide you with the tools and inspiration to flourish in the ever-evolving field of child development. By participating in cutting-edge research and practical learning experiences, you'll gain the knowledge and skills to make a significant impact on the lives of children and their families. Here, at the Child Development Center, the pursuit of limitless learning and exceptional achievement is our standard.

name: College of Nursing
desc: Welcome to the College of Nursing, where we embrace the profound impact of early nurturing and education on lifelong health and well-being. Within our supportive and inclusive community, dedicated mentors guide you to excel in the intricate field of nursing, equipping you with the knowledge and skills to make a tangible difference in the lives of individuals and families. Through innovative research and immersive practical experiences, we empower you to navigate the complexities of healthcare and emerge as compassionate, competent caregivers. Join us in a journey where learning knows no bounds, and excellence is the standard.

name: Open Graduate School
desc: Welcome to the Open Graduate School at our University. Our vibrant community of scholars is dedicated to advancing knowledge and fostering intellectual growth. From cutting-edge research to interdisciplinary collaboration, we're committed to pushing the boundaries of academic excellence. Join us as we explore new frontiers of learning and discovery. Welcome to a place where innovation thrives and curiosity reigns.

name: College of Arts and Sciences
desc: The College of Arts and Sciences at this university welcomes you to its energetic community. Here, scholars explore the vast spectrum of human creativity and knowledge. From the mysteries of the universe to the intricacies of human behavior, the college is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of understanding. By embracing diverse viewpoints and fostering creative exploration, they tackle the complexities of the world. The college invites you to join them at the forefront of intellectual discovery and artistic expression.

courses.BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN BIOLOGY: The Biological Science Program equips BS Biology graduates with skills for the Philippines' agricultural sector. The program offers a structured curriculum and graduates can find jobs in research and corporations. The rise of bio-aligned industries creates more opportunities.
courses.BACHELOR OF ARTS IN JOURNALISM: This program cultivates well-rounded media professionals by equipping graduates with the knowledge, skills, ethics, and values needed to succeed in the rapidly evolving media landscape. Graduates are prepared to anticipate and respond to industry changes and can pursue diverse careers, including broadcast journalism, public relations, and web development.
courses.BACHELOR OF ARTS IN ENGLISH: Bachelor of Arts in English provides a comprehensive program of reading, writing, and critical thinking. Students read, discuss, analyze, and write about challenging works of recognized literary merit to develop honest, concise, and effective use of language and the ability to organize ideas in a clear, coherent, and persuasive way. Independent literary analysis and a total mastery of writing skills are goals of the course.
courses.BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN PSYCHOLOGY: The psychology program gives students core knowledge, research methods, and critical thinking skills for success in psychology careers or further studies. It offers a broad foundation with electives, and specialized tracks for clinical, school, or industrial psychology.
courses.BACHELOR OF ARTS IN POLITICAL SCIENCE: Political Science, as a discipline, delves into multifarious and intricate activities of man as well as political, economic, social and cultural processes. Students are trained for careers in politics, law, teaching, civil service, and foreign service. Furthermore, students are equipped with knowledge and skills in discharging their rights and obligations as members of a democratic community, to prepare them to be vigilant, dynamic, and civic-spirited citizens.
courses.BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN SOCIAL WORK: The curriculum of the program is geared towards developing competent social workers equipped with desirable social, cultural and moral values. Its aim is to produce globally competitive social workers needed to promote social growth and people empowerment through various social and community activities.
courses.BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN APPLIED MATHEMATI: The Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics with a major in Statistics is offered by the College of Arts and Sciences. This four-year program, also available in a three-year inter-modal format, combines a well-rounded general education curriculum with in-depth coursework in mathematics and statistics. Students take 63 units of general education and 78 units of math and statistics courses.

name: Interdisciplinary Research Facility Building
desc: The Interdisciplinary Research Building (IDRB) houses the majority of the laboratories of various specialties such as engineering and electronics, microbiology, genetics and molecular biology, vaccinology, parasitology, chemistry, and other fields intended to be used for research by faculty members and students of the University. Experts (ideally Designated Faculty Researchers) in the particular discipline shall be assigned to head a specific laboratory and shall coordinate closely with the head of TSD.

facilities.Higher Education Cooperation Towards Tra: The HECTOR project is an attempt to develop an open resource system for higher education institutions in the Philippines providing transactional education (TNE) services in support of the TNE initiatives of CHED.
facilities.Simulation Measurement and Modelling Lab: Simulation, Modeling and Measurement Laboratory (SiMM) is designed to create an environment that can accelerate the productivity of engineers, scientists, and student researchers through simulation and modeling of the designed machines, devices, and equipment. A total of seven research conducted through internal and external funding and six ongoing research. The laboratory has Computers and Simulation and Modeling Software like MATLab, NI LabVIEW, COMSOL, GAMS0
facilities.Microbial Culture Collection and Service: The Microbial Culture Collection and Service Facility (MCCSF) is a laboratory intended for the collection and maintenance of various cultures from bacteria, molds, yeasts, and algae. Though this is still in its infancy stage, the laboratCory houses several microbial cultures and will soon accept samples for microbiological analysis, hopefully, for resource generation in addition to services to the community. This laboratory is also a facility for research activities currently focusing on street foods, actinobacteria, lactic and cacao fermentation and other related research.
facilities.Chemical Biology and Biotechnology Labor: Chemical Biology and Biotechnology Laboratory (CBBL) is involved in the use of chemical tools to understand biology and utilize these towards making bio-based products.
facilities.Natural Products Laboratory: Natural Products Laboratory (NPL) is a shared facility for research and development of natural products. It focuses on natural product research, traditional medicine, and phytochemistry.
facilities.Genetic Engineering and Systems Biology: Genetic Engineering and System Biology is involved in the application of modern biotechnology aided by a whole systems approach towards crop and animal improvement and microbial engineering.
facilities.Bio-Analytical Services Facility: The Bio-analytical Service Facility or BASF is a support laboratory of the University that aims to provide quality analytical research and extension services to students, researchers, from government agencies, private institutions, and industries in the region. It also offers a new range of applications in environmental monitoring, food and fragrance analysis, forensic, biological analysis, pharmaceutical and medical applications. In addition, this laboratory does not only allow expansion of research and development programs but also an income-generating project of the University. The research currently implemented are the wet processing technology through microbial fermentation for high-quality chocolates, Development of biological-based termiticide, GC-MS profiling of aroma compounds and antioxidant capacity of liberica and excelsa coffee, and Pesticide Residue Analysis of Vegetable Production in Selected Town in Cavite.

name: Historical and Cultural Museum
desc: Welcome to the Historical and Cultural Museum at our University. Our museum is a treasure trove of artifacts, stories, and memories that celebrate our rich heritage and diverse culture. From ancient relics to modern masterpieces, we showcase the beauty and complexity of our shared history. Step inside and embark on a journey through time and tradition. Welcome to a place where the past comes alive and the present is illuminated.

name: Department of Crop Science
desc: Welcome to the Department of Crop Science at the University. Our state-of-the-art facilities and passionate community of scholars are dedicated to exploring the wonders of life. From molecular biology to ecology, we're committed to advancing our understanding of the natural world and addressing global challenges. Join us on a journey of discovery and exploration. Welcome to the heart of scientific inquiry.

name: College of Criminal Justice
desc: The College of Criminal Justice at the University fosters a deep understanding and practical application of law enforcement, criminal justice, and public safety principles.  Imbued with a commitment to ethical conduct, professional excellence, and community service, the college cultivates students for fulfilling careers in law enforcement, corrections, and security.  The curriculum offers a rich tapestry of experiences, from immersive hands-on training to pioneering research endeavors.  This comprehensive approach equips graduates with the necessary tools and knowledge to become instrumental agents of positive change within their communities.  By joining the College of Criminal Justice, students become part of a collaborative effort to forge a safer and more equitable society.

courses.Bachelor of Science in Criminology: • Criminology examines all aspects of crime, from the creation and violation of laws to the societal response. It delves into the work of justice agencies, equipping graduates to serve their communities in various capacities. These include crime prevention, investigation, law enforcement, rehabilitation, and research, all with a focus on professional ethics and effectiveness.
courses.Bachelor of Science in Industrial Securi: • This security program equips graduates for leadership positions. It delves into interventions for various human challenges and explores methods to safeguard resources from harm.

name: Department of Crop Science
desc: Welcome to the Department of Crop Science at the University. Our state-of-the-art facilities and passionate community of scholars are dedicated to exploring the wonders of life. From molecular biology to ecology, we're committed to advancing our understanding of the natural world and addressing global challenges. Join us on a journey of discovery and exploration. Welcome to the heart of scientific inquiry.

name: University Cashier
desc: The University Cashier's Office, situated in located at the back of the Administration Building, acts as the central hub for students, faculty, and staff to manage all university-related finances.  Dedicated staff provide exceptional customer service in a transparent environment. Readily addresses any questions regarding university fees and payments. This ensures a smooth and hassle-free experience when navigating financial obligations at the university.

name: International Convention Center
desc: The University International Convention Center serves as a multipurpose venue for significant university events and external collaborations. This impressive structure hosts formal university functions, from standardized exams and bustling job fairs to grand graduation ceremonies, with its adaptable space configurable to each event's needs.  Beyond university-organized gatherings, the center can be rented by external organizations for conferences, or even social events. The University International Convention Center embodies the university's pursuit of excellence, offering a platform to celebrate student achievements and foster collaboration within the broader community.

name: Saluysoy Resort
desc: Welcome to Saluysoy Resort, where every moment is a celebration of nature's beauty and the warmth of Filipino hospitality. Nestled amidst lush greenery and serene waters, our resort is a haven of relaxation and rejuvenation. Explore the wonders of our pristine surroundings, from tranquil lakes to vibrant flora and fauna. Whether you're seeking adventure or simply a peaceful retreat, Saluysoy offers an unforgettable experience for all. Step into a world where time slows down, and every breath is filled with the essence of tranquility. Welcome to Saluysoy Resort, where nature's embrace awaits.

name: Coffee Processing Center
desc: The Coffee Processing Center is jointly managed by CvSU and Agricultural Competitiveness Enhancement Fund (ACEF). It produces good quality ground coffee loved by many who tasted its unique aroma.

name: University Infirmary Building
desc:
We are open!
Mondays - Thursdays
7:00 am - 6:00 pm

The Cavite State University Health Services (CvSU Health Services). This central facility embodies the university's commitment to student well-being by offering a comprehensive range of health services. True to its mission, CvSU Health Services prioritizes preventative, promotive, and curative care for its target clientele – students, faculty, and staff. The dedicated staff provides quality, affordable, and easily accessible healthcare, ensuring a healthy and supportive environment for the entire university community.

services.General Medicine:
Services offered under General Medicine includes:
• Consultation and Treatment
• Minor Surgery
• First Aid Treatment
• Pre-enrollment Medical Examination
• Pre-employment Medical Examination
• Annual Physical Examination
services.Dental Medicine:
Services offered under Dental Medicine:
• Consultation
• Oral Prophylaxis (Cleaning)
• Simple Tooth Extractions
• Restorative Treatment (Tooth Filling)
services.Ancillary Services:
Services offered under Ancillary Services:
• Radiologic/X-ray Services
• Laboratory Examinations
• Electrocardiogram (ECG)
• Ambulances (For EMERGENCY cases only)

name: University Chapel
desc: The University Chapel serves as a central hub for religious life on campus, welcoming all faiths for observance and reflection.  This sacred space hosts regular services like Catholic masses and interfaith prayers, fostering a sense of community for those with shared beliefs.  Beyond celebrations, the Chapel provides a dignified space for funerals and memorials, offering solace during times of loss.  When not hosting services, the peaceful atmosphere invites individuals for quiet contemplation and personal reflection, regardless of their religious background.  The University Chapel embodies inclusivity, offering a haven for spiritual connection amidst the vibrant campus life.

name: Rolle Hall
desc: Cavite State University's Rolle Hall, named after the university's first president, Santiago M. Rolle, serves as a versatile event space for the CvSU community and beyond. This spacious hall can accommodate up to 250 guests and adapts to various functions, from weddings and birthdays to seminars, workshops, and even political events.  As a central venue, Rolle Hall not only offers functionality but also embodies CvSU's legacy, fostering a space for community gatherings, celebrations, and the creation of lasting memories.

name: Science Cafe
desc: Situated beside the library, the Science Cafe offers a unique blend of refreshments and intellectual engagement. Beyond serving coffee beverages and snacks, the cafe fosters a casual environment for scientific exploration. Events and talks hosted there spark curiosity and discussions about science, while the cafe itself serves as a natural gathering place for students, faculty, and staff with a shared passion for the subject. The Science Cafe acts as a gateway to exploration, offering a welcoming space to delve into new ideas, connect with fellow science enthusiasts, and enjoy a stimulating atmosphere that goes beyond the typical cafe experience.

name: Saluysoy Cafeteria
desc: Saluysoy Cafeteria serves as the university's central hub for meals and beverages, catering to students, faculty, and staff.  This bustling space offers a diverse menu encompassing breakfast, lunch, snacks, and various drinks, ensuring everyone finds something to satisfy their hunger pangs throughout the day.  Prioritizing convenience, the cafeteria features a streamlined service system ideal for the fast-paced university environment.  Beyond sustenance, Saluysoy Cafeteria fosters a sense of community by creating a casual environment that encourages interaction and connection between students, faculty, and staff, solidifying its role as an integral part of the university experience.
